img_above_text:
The Cosmo Radiance can be used to craft the Spikeshaft Staff from the Shrine.
To obtain the Cosmo Radiance, you need to defeat Yellowbrow in New Thunderclap Temple in The New West. This is the final boss of the chapter.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Weapons locations and Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game.

img_summary: The image depicts the boss fight against Yellowbrow in *Black Myth: Wukong*. Yellowbrow is the final boss of the chapter, located in New Thunderclap Temple in The New West. Defeating Yellowbrow rewards the Cosmo Radiance, which can be used to craft the Spikeshaft Staff at the Shrine. The image highlights the gameplay interface, including health bars, abilities, and the player's combat engagement with the boss.
